recetas.descripcion: A classic apple pie with cinnamon.
pasos: Peel and slice the apples.
Mix flour, sugar, and cinnamon.
Add eggs and butter.
Place the apples in the mixture.
Bake at 180 degrees for 45 minutes.

recetas.descripcion: A classic Caesar salad with chicken.
pasos: Chop the lettuce.
Grill the chicken and cut into strips.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Add the dressing and mix well.

recetas.descripcion: A rich and moist chocolate cake.
pasos: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees.
Mix flour, cocoa powder, and sugar.
Add eggs and melted butter.
Pour the batter into a baking tin.
Bake for 35 minutes.

recetas.descripcion: Classic Italian pasta with meat sauce.
pasos: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

recetas.descripcion: Quick and easy vegetable stir fry.
pasos: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add garlic and sauté for a minute.
Add vegetables and stir fry until tender.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.

recetas.descripcion: A spicy and flavorful chicken curry.
pasos: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in a pot.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and cook for another minute.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice.
Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Add milk and eggs, and whisk until smooth.
Heat butter in a pan.
Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
Cook ground beef in a pan with taco seasoning.
Chop lettuce and tomato.
Assemble the tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with your favorite salsa.

recetas.descripcion: A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits.
pasos: Chop all fruits into bite-sized pieces.
Mix all fruits in a bowl.
Drizzle with honey and toss gently.
Chill in the fridge before serving.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 4-6 minutes on each side.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the top before serving.
Preheat the oven to 180 degrees.
Melt butter and mix with sugar and cocoa powder.
Add eggs and vanilla extract.
Stir in flour until combined.
Pour batter into a baking pan and bake for 25 minutes.

recetas.descripcion: Creamy pasta with chicken and Alfredo sauce.
pasos: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in butter.
Add chicken and cook until done.
Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese.
Mix the sauce with the cooked fettuccine.
Preheat the oven to 175 degrees.
Mash bananas in a bowl.
Mix in melted butter and sugar.
Add eggs and stir well.
Stir in flour and baking soda.
Pour batter into a loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.
Chop all vegetables into small pieces.
Sauté onion and celery in a pot.
Add carrots, potatoes, and tomatoes.
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Simmer for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Preheat the oven to 150 degrees.
Season ribs with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder.
Wrap ribs in foil and bake for 2.5 hours.
Remove from oven and brush with BBQ sauce.
Grill ribs for 10 minutes, basting with more sauce.
Preheat the oven to 175 degrees.
Mix pumpkin puree, sugar, and spices.
Add eggs and evaporated milk.
Pour the mixture into a pie crust.
Bake for 60 minutes.
Cook chicken in a pan with taco seasoning.
Chop lettuce and tomato.
Assemble the tacos with chicken, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with your favorite salsa.
Preheat the oven to 220 degrees.
Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
Add sliced bell peppers, mushrooms, and onions.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until cheese is melted.
Preheat the oven to 190 degrees.
Rub chicken with olive oil and season with garlic, rosemary, and thyme.
Stuff the chicken with lemon halves.
Roast for 1.5 hours until golden brown.
Let rest for 10 minutes before carving.
Preheat the oven to 175 degrees.
Mix oats, flour, and sugar.
Add melted butter and eggs.
Stir in raisins.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 12-15 minutes.
Heat butter in a pan.
Add minced garlic and sauté for a minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Season with salt and lemon juice.
Garnish with parsley before serving.
